name: unsoiled
content:
unsoiled adjective
(CLEAN)
Add to word list
Add to word list
not made dirty by something: It is possible to recycle the unsoiled part of your pizza box. The aim is for the patient's clothes and furnishings to remain dry and unsoiled. Opposite
soiled
More examplesFewer examplesThere was general plastic waste including soiled and unsoiled kitchen plastics - chicken wrappers and biscuit packets.Prior to the breeding season, we installed new nest boxes containing unsoiled sand.He was unhurt and unsoiled, his well-pressed shirt still crisp.

unsoiled adjective
(NOT SPOILED)
not damaged or affected by something bad: I neither smoked nor drank - I stayed unsoiled. The image presented is of a pure and unsoiled culture.
